21  Shader(const char* vertexPath, const char* fragmentPath, const char* geometryPath = nullptr)
22  {
23  // 1. retrieve the vertex/fragment source code from filePath
24  std::string vertexCode;
25  std::string fragmentCode;
26  std::string geometryCode;
27  std::ifstream vShaderFile;
28  std::ifstream fShaderFile;
29  std::ifstream gShaderFile;
30  // ensure ifstream objects can throw exceptions:
31  vShaderFile.exceptions (std::ifstream::failbit | std::ifstream::badbit);
32  fShaderFile.exceptions (std::ifstream::failbit | std::ifstream::badbit);
33  gShaderFile.exceptions (std::ifstream::failbit | std::ifstream::badbit);
34  try
35  {
36  // open files
37  vShaderFile.open(vertexPath);
38  fShaderFile.open(fragmentPath);
39  std::stringstream vShaderStream, fShaderStream;
40  // read file's buffer contents into streams
41  vShaderStream << vShaderFile.rdbuf();
42  fShaderStream << fShaderFile.rdbuf();
43  // close file handlers
44  vShaderFile.close();
45  fShaderFile.close();
46  // convert stream into string
47  vertexCode = vShaderStream.str();
48  fragmentCode = fShaderStream.str();
49 
50  /*std::cout << "vertex shader code:\n" << "-----------------------------------------------------------\n" << vertexCode
51  << "-----------------------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
52  std::cout << "fragment shader code:\n" << "-----------------------------------------------------------\n" << fragmentCode
53  << "-----------------------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
54 */
55  // if geometry shader path is present, also load a geometry shader
56  if(geometryPath != nullptr)
57  {
58  gShaderFile.open(geometryPath);
59  std::stringstream gShaderStream;
60  gShaderStream << gShaderFile.rdbuf();
61  gShaderFile.close();
62  geometryCode = gShaderStream.str();
63  }
64  }
65  catch (std::ifstream::failure& e)
66  {
67  std::cout << "ERROR::SHADER::FILE_NOT_SUCCESFULLY_READ: " << e.what() << std::endl;
68  }
69  const char* vShaderCode = vertexCode.c_str();
70  const char * fShaderCode = fragmentCode.c_str();
71  // 2. compile shaders
72  unsigned int vertex, fragment;
73  // vertex shader
74  vertex = glCreateShader(GL_VERTEX_SHADER);
75  glShaderSource(vertex, 1, &vShaderCode, NULL);
76  glCompileShader(vertex);
77  checkCompileErrors(vertex, "VERTEX");
78  // fragment Shader
79  fragment = glCreateShader(GL_FRAGMENT_SHADER);
80  glShaderSource(fragment, 1, &fShaderCode, NULL);
81  glCompileShader(fragment);
82  checkCompileErrors(fragment, "FRAGMENT");
83  // if geometry shader is given, compile geometry shader
84  unsigned int geometry;
85  if(geometryPath != nullptr)
86 
87  {
88  const char * gShaderCode = geometryCode.c_str();
89  geometry = glCreateShader(GL_GEOMETRY_SHADER);
90  glShaderSource(geometry, 1, &gShaderCode, NULL);
91  glCompileShader(geometry);
92  checkCompileErrors(geometry, "GEOMETRY");
93  }
94  // shader Program
95  ID = glCreateProgram();
96  glAttachShader(ID, vertex);
97  glAttachShader(ID, fragment);
98  if(geometryPath != nullptr)
99  glAttachShader(ID, geometry);
100  glLinkProgram(ID);
101  checkCompileErrors(ID, "PROGRAM");
102  // delete the shaders as they're linked into our program now and no longer necessery
103  glDeleteShader(vertex);
104  glDeleteShader(fragment);
105  if(geometryPath != nullptr)
106  glDeleteShader(geometry);
107  }

167  }
168  // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
169  void setMat4(const std::string &name, const glm::mat4 &mat) const
170  {
171  GLint loc = glGetUniformLocation(ID, name.c_str());
172  if (loc == -1)
173  {
174  std::cerr << "Failed to find uniform " << name << std::endl;
175  }
176  else
177  {
178  glUniformMatrix4fv(loc, 1, GL_FALSE, &mat[0][0]);
179  GLenum error = glGetError();
180  if (error != GL_NO_ERROR)
181  {
182  std::cerr << "Failed to set uniform " << name << ": OpenGL error " << error << std::endl;
183  }
184  }
185  }

188 private:
189  // utility function for checking shader compilation/linking errors.
190  // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
191  void checkCompileErrors(GLuint shader, std::string type)
192  {
193  GLint success;
194  GLchar infoLog[1024];
195  if(type != "PROGRAM")
196  {
197  glGetShaderiv(shader, GL_COMPILE_STATUS, &success);
198  if(!success)
199  {
200  glGetShaderInfoLog(shader, 1024, NULL, infoLog);
201  std::cout << "ERROR::SHADER_COMPILATION_ERROR of type: " << type << "\n" << infoLog << "\n -- --------------------------------------------------- -- " << std::endl;
202  exit(-1);
203  }
204  }
205  else
206  {
207  glGetProgramiv(shader, GL_LINK_STATUS, &success);
208  if(!success)
209  {
210  glGetProgramInfoLog(shader, 1024, NULL, infoLog);
211  std::cout << "ERROR::PROGRAM_LINKING_ERROR of type: " << type << "\n" << infoLog << "\n -- --------------------------------------------------- -- " << std::endl;
212  exit(-1);
213  }
214  }
215  }
